wikipedia_page.main: Dennis (Denny) Willis (1920 – 17 March 1995) was a Scottish comedian.

response: His son Denny Willis was also a music hall performer and incorporated a number of his father's routines into his act.

link_mentions.page: Publications by Denis Gifford on radio, television, music and music hall

response: Bobbie Willis (1941 - 2005) was a Glasgow born comedian, singer and actress. She was the daughter of entertainer Denny Willis and grand daughter of movie star Dave Willis.Obituary The stage
